tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: The Introduction is always second. The title and contents menu title match for the Introduction.

tutorials.title: Get Started
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisites for customers using Free Trial and Paid tenancies. The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Create Virtual Cloud Network (VCN)
Lab 2: Create MySQL HeatWave Instance
Lab 3: Create Compute Instance
Lab 4: Connect to HeatWave with MySQL Shell and Workbench
Lab 5: Load Airportdb Data into HeatWave Cluster
Lab 6: Run Queries in HeatWave and MySQL
Lab 7: Create and Test HeatWave Lakehouse
Lab 8: (Bonus) Build Oracle Analytics Cloud Dashboard with HeatWave
Lab 9: Create and Test HeatWave Machine Learning
Lab 10: (Bonus)  Build LAMP Application with MySQL HeatWave
Lab 11: Connect to HeatWave with OCI Bastion
Lab 12: Connect to HeatWave with OCI SQL Worksheet
Lab 13: Manage MySQL HeatWave DB System
Lab 14: Backup MySQL HeatWave DB System
Lab 15: Configure MySQL HeatWave DB System
Lab 16: Setup MySQL HeatWave Read Replicas
Lab 17: Setup MySQL HeatWave High Availability
Lab 18: Migrate Data Into MySQL HeatWave
Lab 19: Setup MySQL HeatWave Inbound Replication
Lab 20: Stop OCI Services
